name: Four Rooms (HallwayGames)
description:
Four Rooms was supposed to be a 3D linear puzzle game with a lovely plot. However due to a mixup by a developer it ended up being more like a 3D puzzle fueled fever dream, however it kept it's puzzling charm.

Four Rooms was made in 48 hours for the Game Makers Tool Kit 2020 game jam. It is a fully voice acted 3D puzzle game with a twist.

Give it a play and let me know what you think, thanks!

Credits:
Joshua Coombes-Hall - Writer, Designer, Programmer, Voice Acting and 3D Modeller.

Kelton Hallo - Original Music

Matthew Gibson - Writing, Voice Acting and Voice Editing.
